attributes.title: Namond
attributes.season: ''Game of Thrones: A Telltale Games Series''

sections.History:
===Background===
Namond was a friend of [[Rodrik Forrester]] and [[Meghan]]. The three of them would play together on [[Rob|Red Rob]]'s farm when they were children.

==="[[The Sword in the Darkness]]"===
Rodrik travels to Red Rob's abandoned farm to meet in secret with [[Gwyn Whitehill]]. He examines an old well and remembers hiding in there while playing [[Monsters-and-maidens]] with Namond and Meghan.<ref>"[[The Sword in the Darkness]]"</ref>
